name: A.D.2047
summary:
一场惊心动魄，爱恨交织的VR互动电影之旅。

《A.D.2047》是Recano开发的一款在VR平台上的互动电影式游戏。
是针对VR平台的特殊硬件设计，
创造的一种只有在VR设备上才能获得的独特体验。

突如其来的车祸，将身为警探的你卷入到一起连环杀人事件中。
随着调查的深入，你发现在流光溢彩的城市背后，暗流涌动，
交织着各方力量的阴谋算计。
而身处冲突漩涡中心的你，只有依靠自己的力量找出真凶，
才能阻止不断袭来的致命杀机……






《A.D.2047》 invites players to have a thrilling, love hate, VR interactive movie tour. 

《A.D.2047》 is an interactive movie game developed by Recano on the VR platform for its special hardware design, creating unique experience that is only available on VR devices！ 

The sudden car accident involved you, a detective, into serial killings.
With the in-depth investigation, you will find that the colorful city intertwined with the strength of the parties’ complot.
Only rely on your own hand to find the murderer, you can prevent the repeated fatal murder......
